instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3115 doesnt post
threads.message:
820-3115. hdd light turns on but not posting after that. recognizes no memory and cpu vcore 0.8v

thoughts

threads.title: 820-3115 doesnt post
threads.message: History? Liquid? CPU core at 0.8V suggests something is happening. Plug in USB mouse and see if it lights up.

threads.title: 820-3115 doesnt post
threads.message:
no liquid not charging, but turns on through battery smcbc_ok not getting 3v. i took pp3v42 and connected it to it just to see if it will charge and it does. 

even if i remove jumper it doesnt post with battery

usb mouse is on

threads.title: 820-3115 doesnt post
threads.message: If USB mouse lights up the board is probably booting. PPBUS voltage without battery? Do a PRAM reset with an external USB keyboard and see if the board chimes, 4 pin speaker in the case must be connected.

threads.title: 820-3115 doesnt post
threads.message: This morning I tried and no usb mouse. But I didn't do anything. Still 0.8v though.

threads.title: 820-3115 doesnt post
threads.message: You should figure out why there is no ACOK. I suspect corrosion around U7000 or under SMC.
